title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Refined
description: Refine the detailed requirements for the ThreatHuntingPlatform by integrating feedback from relevant stakeholders. Ensure thorough documentation of desired features, functionalities, performance expectations (including response times and scalability), security considerations (including data privacy and cybersecurity standards), compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA), potential integration with existing threat hunting solutions, and compatibility with various operating systems. Conduct industry research, analyze best practices, and evaluate competitors' offerings to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the project scope. Once complete, collaborate with the team to prioritize and decompose the tasks for implementation.

title: Design System Architecture for ThreatHuntingPlatform
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points for the ThreatHuntingPlatform. The design should aim to maximize efficiency, scalability, and security. Consider integrating with existing cybersecurity tools and services as appropriate. To ensure scalability and maintainability, break down the architecture into modular components, adhering to microservices principles where possible. Also, propose a strategy for data privacy and security compliance.

title: Develop Machine Learning Models
description: Research, develop, and train machine learning models for threat detection and analysis.

title: Implement Expert System
description: Design and implement the expert system component for rule-based threat analysis and decision-making.

title: Design Data Storage and Management (Revised)
description: Design and implement a scalable, high-performance, and secure data storage and management system for storing and processing threat data, logs, and analysis results. The system should support ingesting data from various sources, efficient querying and retrieval, data archiving, integration with other components of the platform, and ensure compliance with relevant data privacy and security regulations. The system should also provide mechanisms for real-time data streaming, anomaly detection, and data visualization. Consider optimizing the design to support horizontal scaling, improve performance through caching strategies, and implement data compression techniques to reduce storage costs. Also, consider integrating with popular open-source big data processing frameworks like Apache Hadoop or Apache Spark.
dependencies: Define Data Privacy and Security Compliance Requirements

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the ThreatHuntingPlatform, including dashboards, visualizations, and user interactions.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security and Access Controls for ThreatHuntingPlatform (Revised)
description: Update the description to better reflect the scope of work: Design and implement a robust security framework, access controls, data protection mechanisms, incident response strategies, user authentication, authorization, encryption, audit logging, and intrusion detection systems for the ThreatHuntingPlatform. This includes defining roles and permissions, implementing multi-factor authentication, managing secure data storage, setting up alerting and notification systems for potential security incidents, and ensuring compliance with relevant industry standards.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline with Improved Details
description: Implement a comprehensive continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the ThreatHuntingPlatform. This pipeline will automate building, testing, and deployment processes while ensuring code quality. The pipeline should include stages for linting, static analysis, unit testing, integration testing, and security scanning. Additionally, it should support multiple environments (e.g., development, staging, production) and allow for easy rollbacks if issues arise. To optimize the pipeline's efficiency, consider using popular tools like Jenkins, Travis CI or GitHub Actions.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing Strategy for ThreatHuntingPlatform
description: Create and implement a comprehensive testing strategy that encompasses unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for the ThreatHuntingPlatform. The strategy should clearly define test cases, expected outcomes, and any necessary test data. Additionally, include performance and security testing where applicable, detailing specific methodologies, tools, and metrics to be used. To facilitate collaboration and ensure that all aspects are covered, consider involving relevant team members such as frontend/backend developers, database specialist, devops engineer, QA tester, and security specialist in the process.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the ThreatHuntingPlatform, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance manuals.
